For All Time in Every Country.--In the place of the national festival which the Jewish people had 
                                                                           276
observed, He instituted a memorial service, the ordinance of feet washing and the sacramental supper, to be observed through all time by His followers in every country. These should ever repeat Christ's act, that all may see that true service calls for unselfish ministry.--Signs of the Times, May 16, 1900.
